name: Traffic (GhostGoats)
description:
If the game is cut off at the sides try putting it into fullscreen. (Bottom right corner)

Gain points by getting cars to the other side of the screen.
Lose a point when cars crash.
Beat a level to unlock the next level.

Controls:
Clicking a car stops and starts it.
Tanks can't be stopped!
Escape will return to the main menu.
